verbose_text: The elevation of PKC in the present work was in line with the results of the previous studies which suggested that the hepatic oxidative stress and injury induced by bezafibrate [XREF_BIBR] and acetaminophen [XREF_BIBR] and CCl 4 [XREF_BIBR] was mediated by elevation of PKC.
evidence: CCl 4  [ XREF_BIBR ] was mediated by elevation of PKC
